titles.title: ATTAIN Mental Health Act
A bill to establish an interactive online dashboard to improve public access to information about grant funding related to mental health and substance use disorder programs.
Achieving Thorough Transparency and Accessibility for Information Navigation on Mental Health Act of 2023
ATTAIN Mental Health Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
Achieving Thorough Transparency and Accessibility for Information Navigation on Mental Health Act of 2023 or the ATTAIN Mental Health Act
This bill requires the Department of Health and Human Services to establish an online dashboard with information about federal grants relating to mental health and substance use disorders.
Among other requirements, the dashboard must be searchable, current, and indicate whether the application period is open or closed. The dashboard must also include information about associated state programs and subgrants.
